data.title: Translation agency Uzhhorod
data.meta_description: Quality translation agency No. 1 in Uzhhorod âœ… Translation services in Uzhgorod on any subject with guaranteed delivery worldwide.
data.text:
Uzhhorod is a small city of about 120 thousand people. Most residents are Ukrainians, but there are also representatives of other nationalities. Investment and business activities are intensifying in the city, and industrial enterprises are developing, many of which have international suppliers and partners. The closeness of the borders of another country allows residents to travel abroad frequently. Both legal entities and individuals often require translation of documents in Uzhhorod and other linguistic services.

Services of translation agency in Uzhhorod

We work with certified translators.We work with certified translators. Today, their number exceeds 600 people, not including native speakers. Translation agency MK:translations provides translation of documents in Uzhhorod into Slovak, English, Polish, French, German, etc. We work in various areas, each of them has some peculiarities:

Tender documentation. Competing in a tender, it is important to prepare a package of documents that meets international requirements. Special care is required for drafting a quote. Team of a translation agency in Uzhhorod will not only adapt the document, but also ensure the accuracy of the translation and preserve the meaning.

International business and its globalization are impossible without partnership. Business translation should take into account the interests of both partners and their legal protection. It is important to preserve the terminology, meaning, and linguistic norms. Uzhhorod translation agency specializes in the translation of agreements and contracts, so our specialists do not make mistakes while working with the source text.

Legal translation. Each country has its own judicial system and rules of law. The translation has to be done by professionals, as mistakes are unacceptable in this case. Uzhhorod translation agency works with extracts from the register, articles of association, court decisions, and other documents.

Translation of documents in Uzhhorod

You can also contact MK:translations to translate financial, medical, and technical documents. We work with IT products, market research, and in other areas. If you need a translator on an ongoing basis, you can sign an agreement with the translation agency in Uzhhorod and cooperate with us on a regular basis.

Advantages of translation agency in Uzhhorod
